author: James Martin
method: In a pestle and mortar, grind the spices. Heat the oil in a pan and cook out the spices for 1-2 minutes. Add the tomatoes, beans, chilli, sugar, lemon juice and a splash of water and simmer gently for 5-8 minutes. Pour into a bowl and top with yoghurt, coriander and avocado.
ingredients: pinch cumin seeds,  pinch dried chilli,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ tin of cherry tomatoes,  200g/7oz mixed beans,  ¼ chilli chopped,  pinch sugar,  squeeze lemon juice,  splash of water,  Greek-style yoghurt,  handful coriander ,  ½ avocado, sliced
